name: Spectrum Brands Holdings, Inc.
description: Spectrum Brands Holdings, Inc. is a global consumer products company specializing in a wide range of branded products for both home and garden, as well as personal care. Founded in 1993, Spectrum Brands has established itself as a leader in the consumer goods industry through its diverse portfolio of brands, including well-known names like Remington, George Foreman, and Black+Decker. The company operates in various segments, including Home & Garden, Global Pet Supplies, and Home Appliances, offering products that improve the quality of life for consumers worldwide. Spectrum Brands is committed to innovation and sustainability, focusing on developing new products that meet the changing needs of consumers while minimizing environmental impact. The company's mission is to enhance the everyday lives of consumers, making it a trusted choice for households around the globe. With a strong emphasis on quality, performance, and customer satisfaction, Spectrum Brands continues to expand its market presence through strategic acquisitions and partnerships. The company is headquartered in Middleton, Wisconsin, USA, and serves customers in over 100 countries.
